title: IN PHOTOS: K-beauty brand Innisfree's first Manila store
text: SUMMARY This is AI generated summarization, which may have errors. For context, always refer to the full article.  MANILA, Philippines — Popular Korean roadshop beauty brand Innisfree has officially stepped foot on Philippine grounds, much to the joy of K-beauty-crazed fans – ourselves included. (Prices, top picks: Innisfree in the Philippines)  Innisfree’s first-ever physical store opens to the public on Friday, November 23, and is located at the ground floor of SM Mall of Asia’s main mall.           Crowd-favorite Innisfree essentials are available here for purchase, like the Super Volcanic Pore Clay Mask, Green Tea Seed Serum, No Sebum Mineral Powders, Jeju Orchid Eye Cream, sheet masks, and many, many more! Who else can’t wait to pay the MOA branch a visit? —Rappler.com Error. Please abide by Rappler's commenting guidelines. There are no comments yet. Add your comment to start the conversation.
